short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check price history, compare price from multiple vendors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension for the pcpph.in website, the extension works on the following websites:

mdcomputers.in
tpstech.in
vedantcomputers.com,
elitehubs.com
compify.in
nationalpc.in
tlggaming.com
theitdepot.com
primeabgb.com
pcstudio.in

After opening a specific product on the above sites, pressing get details will show you price from other vendors in a new tab.
